properties.title: NRC Report: Flaring at Motiva/Shell Chemical, Norco
properties.description:
Report Details
NRC Report ID: 1105169
Incident Time: 2015-01-08 13:48
Nearest City: Norco, LA
Location: 15536 RIVER ROAD
Incident Type: FIXED
Material: UNKNOWN ETHYLENE
Medium Affected: AIR
Suspected Responsible Party: MOTIVA/SHELL CHEMICAL

Report Description
CALLER STATED THAT THE PROCESSING UNIT EXPERIENCED AN UPSET DUE TO THE COLD WEATHER CAUSING THE UNIT TO GO TO FLARE CAUSING A RELEASE OF ETHYLENE TO THE ATMOSPHERE.

properties.title: Odor, Headaches, Hard to Breathe in St. Rose
properties.description: My name is Barbara Green. I'm at 624 Turtle Creek Lane. I have been, for the last two months, smelling a odor that has been stopping my nose up, giving me a headache, making it hard to breathe. I've been to the hospital. I'm still suffering with breathing problems. Last month, as of December the 1st to December 31st, 2014 and as of January 2015, it's been from January 1st, on up until today which is Friday January 23rd, 2015. The smell is causing problems for my husband who knows as well as you know as well as myself. I'm so busy, I'm hurting, I'm in so much distress from respiratory problems. I don't get to call you as regular as I'd like, so I'm retroactive dating my dates from December to January, the whole month. It's a consistent smell. Sometimes it's stronger, but it's been consistent. Again, Barbara Green. My number is area code 504-401-4319. Thank you very much and I hope to hear from you soon. Bye bye.

properties.title: Hideous, Disgusting, Sickening Belching from ECI Plant in Gramercy
properties.description: Hi Good Guys. My name is Jane and I am calling to report the E. C. I. Plant out in Gramercy. The coke plant that is belching, the most hideous disgusting sickening. It's getting people migraines and it's making them nauseated, and it's disgusting. Out there in Gramercy ECI plant, a coke plant out there that definitely definitely need to have it's hand slapped. And apparently there, as you one might expect, you know real back sites. Well alright. Help me bye.

properties.title: Smells like Cancer from plant in Gramercy
properties.description: I'm working in Gramercy. Right next down by the Veterans Memorial Bridge. And the large coke plant there, the CCI plant. I believe it is, it's belching out large quantities of yellow sulfurous, very nauseous smelling exhaust. And the flow mix stands probably 30-40 miles from the thing around to the horizon, with the North wind it's going, it's been bad for the past week. And I've also noticed that when it rains, they really open up everything and all of a sudden, its that place is just pouring out yellow smoke so yeah, that's the Coke plan in Gramercy next to the Veterans Memorial Bridge, spewing out yellow green sludge. It smells like cancer and it's been really bad for the past week. Thank you, bye.

I live two blocks from Vertex in Marrero. I often smell a funky old  
peach ring smell coming from their direction. It causes my daughter's  
bronchitis to flare up and her asthma becomes uncontrollable.

properties.title: Smell in Marrero had my stomach hurting a whole lot

When the smell goes, I pretty much go inside but it's a very bad smell and it's hard for me to go outside so. And it smells like a, it smell like a sewer, it's sewer smell like you know, so that's it.

properties.title: Marrero Gas Smell
properties.description: Hi. Well my name is Don Jackson. On last Sunday, encountered a gas smell on River Road closest to Barataria. And it just, we encounter every time we're in the immediate area.

properties.title: Daily Smells from Refinery in Marrero - I had an asthma attack from it
properties.description: Hi. My name is Trish Engle. My phone number is 504-912-1749. I live at 425 Avenue B in Marrero. And I've noticed on almost daily or every other day, excuse me, smells coming from the refinery. In January, I had a asthma attack from it and the smell gets really bad where I don't even leave my home because of it. If someone could call me back, I'd appreciate it. Thank you

properties.title: Gas Smell in Marrero - permeates all around house
properties.description: This is Janet Nichols, I live at 634 Avenue G in. Marrero, Louisiana. And we do smell like gas, like if it was gas in your house that you called the gas company to come check. And we have done that on numerous occasions maybe like every other day or so. I'm not sure what directions it's coming from cuz it permeates the air in the front and the back of the house, the sides wherever we're standing at the moment and around the house. And I guess if we have any other issues we'll call back. Thank you.

properties.title: Terrible Natural Gas Smell in Marrero - Headaches
properties.description: 704 Ave g 70072 been smelln natural gas n just terrible smells. Now seem to be gettn headaches when i normally don't.

properties.title: Toxic/Asphalt Smell in St. Rose - Burning Nose, Can't Breathe
properties.description: My name is Barbara Green and I'm at 624 Turtle Creek Lane and I've been smelling off and on all through the day, but mostly as it gets later up in the evening until the early morning hours. The smell it neither surrenders as it has been in the past, but that's a constant smell and it's toxic smelling. It smells like, like it's a person working on the road or something and you know you smell these chemicals and it's not so much of a bad smell it's more of a toxic smell like asphalt and other chemical smells. And it constantly burns my nose and I can't breathe as well as it takes me some sleeping at night and sometimes I even stop breathing I do. I suffer with sleep apnea but I'm so afraid since I've been breathing in this pollution because I'm constantly dizzy and they haven't found out any reasons why and my fingers are numb all the time and like I said my respiratory system it's just, it's just devastated. And I would just like you to know from February the 1st, the end of January today as well as the first has been a low-grade smell but I can still smell it. And again my name is Barbara Green. My number is area code 504-401-439. Thank you.

properties.title: Sweet Funky Smell in Marrero - made me feel nauseous
properties.description: Hi. My location is Marrero at Avenue A and 7th Street. And on Sunday, February 1st I smelled a sweet funky smell and it made me feel nauseous, okay thank you.

properties.title: Toxic Smell in St. Rose

It's very toxic, it's had us coughing, it's had us breathing difficult as well as nauseous and headache. This was on Friday the 6th, the 7th. Today it was a little smell but not as bad and as well as earlier this morning we smelt it, so that was the 6th, the 7th and the 8th and it was very strong on the 7th and again that was at 624 Turtle Creek Lane, St. Rose Louisiana. Thank you.

That's what I'm calling to report. My name is Zerina Nelson, 320 Morey St in Kenner (504) 469-5927. Thank you.

properties.description: Hello. My name is Zerina Nelson and I belong to Mount Zion Baptist Church in St. Rose, but I'm right here in Kenner, not far from St. Rose and I have find out with the Bucket Brigade. Last night there was a foul odor all over St. Rose. I went up there at 5 o'clock and then I come out of church and there was an odor a terrible scent. I don't know where it's coming from or what, but I'm calling to tell you that there was an odor in St. Rose last night. Okay my number is (504) 469-5927. Thank you.

properties.title: Horrible Sulfur Smell in Marrero
properties.description: Hi. This is Janet Nichols. We live at 634 Avenue G in Marrero. I just let my cat in. I keep forgetting to call yall but I remembered this time and it's horrible, sulfur-type like it's sweet kind of smell. Sometimes like it's just horrible to go even outside your house. And, so I'll just trying to remember to call this time. Thank you.

properties.title: Smokey and Hard to Breathe in Norco
properties.description: In NORCO near 120 Apple St at 5:53 pm on March 3. I smell something burning - it's smokey and it's hard to breathe in. Wind is blowing from the river towards my location. Not a pleasant smell.

properties.title: Perpetual Fire from Smokestack in Norco
properties.description: Hi, I'm in Norco, Louisiana on the corner of First and Barreca St. and it looks like there's a perpetual fire coming out of some sort of a smokestack and the wind is blowing from the river towards up, sort of running parallel to Barreca St. My nose is really like stuffy and I feel like the air is very thick and today's date is March the 3rd and it's, hang on I've gotta check, and I can't tell what the time is but it should have a timestamp. Again this is in Norco and I see this perpetual flare. It doesn't seem like there's an end in sight. It's just fire, lots of fire. Bye.

properties.title: Strong Sulphur Oder - Terrytown 3-2-15
properties.description: At approximately 3:30/pm my wife and I smelled a very strong sulphur like odor outside of our home and I called it in to Jefferson Parish 911 who dispatched the Terrytown 5th District Volunteer Fire Department to our house. The Fireman indicated he did not smell/anything unusual near the Fire House as they were sitting inside with the big bay doors open. He checked the area and returned saying his his hand held monitor did not indicate the presence of anything unusual. He said he had some other areas to check and that finished the conversation. He had a report he was writing on so it`ll be in whatever local system they have in place.  I also called this into the LA State EPA who said they would also enter it into their system.

properties.title: Bright Orange Flare in Norco
properties.description: Good evening. My name is [Keisha Mills?]. I live at 241 Clayton Street and I believe it was Sunday of the strike - the flare was really high, it was bright orange. There was some sulfur in the air. I believe it was, something like that. I was just concerned you know. Basically, you can hear the flare, how high it was going up, the whole area lit up so you didn't need a street light. Basically, there was a lot of smoke that look like it was sulfur, but it wasn't a foggy night. Thank you.

properties.title: Gasoline Smell in St. Rose - I have been gagging and vomiting
properties.description: This is Martha Huckabee. I came off Saint Rose Ave exit, puts you on to River Road about 5 or 10 minutes ago. It's 8:56 right now. I was forced to go past IMTT and Shell to get to river with the state, and when I hit those tankers I felt like I hit a wall of gasoline. I have been gagging and vomiting and my eyes can't stop watering they are burning. There's something in the air. I don't know what it is. It's not the same smell as the other smell, it's more like a gasoline smell. I don't know what it is anyway. I'm gonna call the E. O. C.  and all the numbers right now. Okay, bye (504) 812-7775. And it's Thursday the 26th.

properties.title: Marrero Gas Smell - very scary
properties.description: Hi. This is 634 Avenue G Marrero, Louisiana and I just walked out the door first in the morning and I smelled a gas smell again, and it's just very agitating, very scary kind of thing you know. I mean is something gonna blow up? Do we need to move because it's gonna affect us physically? I mean it's just getting out of hand. I don't know my dog is having skin issues. You know, but I don't know, I just, it's getting to the point where I'm just furious at this whole idea of that they're doing something in the air that we are not supposed to have an air. Thank you.

properties.title: Strong Sulfur Gas Smell in Marrero
properties.description: Yes this is 634 Avenue G. Once again, we have a very, very strong sulfur-y gas kind of smell, we don't wanna go outside. Basically we stay in the house, even though we have a pool and nice yard that we could be out in but we don't wanna be out there breathing all that poor air where it'll be too much. Thank you.

properties.title: NRC Report: Oil: Diesel near Waggaman, LA
properties.description: <b>Report Details</b><br/>NRC Report ID: <a href="http://nrc.uscg.mil/">1114714</a><br/>Incident Time: 2015-04-26 07:10:00<br/>Nearest City: Waggaman, LA<br/>Location: 10800 RIVER ROAD<br/>Incident Type: VESSEL<br/>Material: OIL: DIESEL<br/>Medium Affected: WATER<br/>Suspected Responsible Party: HUDSON MARINE MANAGEMENT SERVICES<br/><b>SkyTruth Analysis</b><br/>Lat/Long: 29.960558, -90.202813 (Approximated from street_address)<br/>Reported Spill Volume: 132.09 gallon<br/><b>Report Description</b><br/>CALLER STATED WHILE GOING INTO THE BERTH TOO FAST A TANKER VESSEL"S FENDER STRUCK A BUMPER. properties.title: NRC Report: Unknown Material near Terrytown, LA
properties.description: <b>Report Details</b><br/>NRC Report ID: <a href="http://nrc.uscg.mil/">1115346</a><br/>Incident Time: 2015-05-03 06:00:00<br/>Nearest City: Terrytown, LA<br/>Location: 908 ASHLAND PLACE WEST<br/>Incident Type: FIXED<br/>Material: UNKNOWN MATERIAL<br/>Medium Affected: AIR<br/>Suspected Responsible Party: <br/><b>SkyTruth Analysis</b><br/>Lat/Long: 29.891030, -90.012525 (Approximated from street_address)<br/><b>Report Description</b><br/>CALLER IS REPORTING A STRONG CHEMICAL ODOR IN THE AIR COMING FROM AN UNKNOWN SOURCE. CALLER BELIEVES THAT THE RELEASE IS EITHER FROM A NEARBY REFINERY OR A VESSEL IN THE AREA.<p><a href="http://alerts.skytruth.org/report/c5515d3b-62e0-3ed9-9e08-5701e3276fd6#c=LABB" target="_top">View Full Report</a></p><img src="http://alerts.skytruth.org/ga.php?utmac=UA-25593503-1&utmn=570088077&utmr=-&utmp=%2Fsyndication%2FLABB%2Fc5515d3b-62e0-3ed9-9e08-5701e3276fd6&guid=ON"/>

properties.title: NRC Report: Phosphoric Acid (30%) near Uncle Sam, LA
properties.description: <b>Report Details</b><br/>NRC Report ID: <a href="http://nrc.uscg.mil/">1115197</a><br/>Incident Time: 2015-05-01 04:40:00<br/>Nearest City: Uncle Sam, LA<br/>Location: 7250 HWY 44<br/>Incident Type: FIXED<br/>Material: PHOSPHORIC ACID (30%)<br/>Medium Affected: LAND<br/>Suspected Responsible Party: MOSAIC FERTILIZER<br/><b>SkyTruth Analysis</b><br/>Lat/Long: 30.019122, -90.774707 (Approximated from street_address)<br/>Reported Spill Volume: 4200 gallon<br/><b>Report Description</b><br/>CALLER STATED A LINE COMING OFF OF A TANK (APPROXIMATELY 5 FEET AWAY)  AT THE FACILITY  HAD A VALVE LEAK CAUSING A RELEASE OF 30% PHOSPHORIC ACID TO THE GROUND AND INTO CONTAINMENT.  THE CALLER STATED THAT THE CAUSE IS UNKNOWN AT THIS TIME.<p><a href="http://alerts.skytruth.org/report/8ef12645-6991-36fe-ba1f-ae501f005439#c=LABB" target="_top">View Full Report</a></p><img src="http://alerts.skytruth.org/ga.php?utmac=UA-25593503-1&utmn=1296067869&utmr=-&utmp=%2Fsyndication%2FLABB%2F8ef12645-6991-36fe-ba1f-ae501f005439&guid=ON"/>
